mapper.sql: userid, tid, account, username, userpwd, organizationid, lawnumber, idnumber, logindeviceid, postid, userphoto, departmentid, deletemark
mapper.select: select a.UserID,a.OrganizationID,a.PostID,b.OrgName,a.UserName,c.OrgTypeLevel from ti_User a left join ti_Organization b on a.OrganizationID=b.OrganizationID LEFT JOIN td_OrgType c on b.OrgTypeID =c.OrgTypeID WHERE Account=#{account} and UserPwd=#{pwd} and DeleteMark=0
mapper.insert: insert into ti_user (userid, tid, account, username, userpwd, organizationid, lawnumber, idnumber, logindeviceid, postid, userphoto, departmentid, deletemark) values (#{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lawnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logindeviceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userphoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deletemark,jdbcType=INTEGER})

tid,
account,
username,

mapper.update:
update ti_user
tid = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userpwd = #{userpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organizationid = #{organizationid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lawnumber = #{lawnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idnumber = #{idnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logindeviceid = #{logindeviceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
postid = #{postid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userphoto = #{userphoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
departmentid = #{departmentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deletemark = #{deletemark,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where userid = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ti_user set tid = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userpwd = #{userpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organizationid = #{organizationid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lawnumber = #{lawnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idnumber = #{idnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logindeviceid = #{logindeviceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postid = #{postid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userphoto = #{userphoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, departmentid = #{departmentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deletemark = #{deletemark,jdbcType=INTEGER} where userid = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
